body:
I love this series: “キモいのに、力強くて逃げられないし。乳首もマンコも”. —  It so perfectly describes the joy of being raped by the ugly bastard.

あきら is my hero.

@alonerone : it's just her imagination. Akira is getting kinkier as she had more sex. Like, at the end of volume 3 she starts expecting the cosplay. Volume 4 she can't wait to try the toys. Actually, at the end of volume 5, Takuya invites her for sex livestreaming, but seems like that set up gets delayed for next time. When Yuina asks her to help with cosplay event in the store, Akira thought it's a good excuse to do cosplay in public. She doesn't even wear underwear. After the trouble with customer (who is supposed to have been banned from that place), she's sent to rest in the back office. She admitted to Takuya about how she is really excited from being harassed in public like that. Even when they're doing sex, she imagine being raped by that ugly man. | Just realized Yuina got her own series. Does Rin also got her own series? She's in affair with their teacher, right.
WTF!? The guy transform to ugly bastard while fucking her!? Eh...
really disappointing, really basic nothing speacial about it and i feel like 5 was much better but i might be stupid idk
